USDJ-1-25-cv-15641 – Federal Civil Rights (2025)

Case Overview

Docket No.: 1:25-cv-15641
Court: United States District Court, District of New Jersey (Camden Vicinage)
Plaintiff: Devon Tyler Barber (pro se)
Defendants: State of New Jersey; City of Atlantic City; Atlantic City Police Department; Officer John Doe 1; Officer John Doe 2
Case Type: Federal Civil Rights (42 U.S.C. § 1983)
Status: Active (pending)

Nature of the Action

This is a federal civil rights action brought under 42 U.S.C. § 1983, alleging ongoing violations of constitutional rights by state and local officials. The complaint asserts claims for unlawful search and seizure, excessive force, and denial of due process. The case is currently pending in the United States District Court for the District of New Jersey.
